function createGame(uint8 difficulty, uint256 expirationDuration) external payable returns (uint256)
function completeGame(uint256 gameId, address winner) external
function getGame(uint256 gameId) external view returns (tuple(address host, address player, uint256 wager, uint8 difficulty, uint8 status, uint256 gameId, uint256 createdAt, uint256 expiresAt))
function getAllPendingGames() external view returns (tuple(address host, address player, uint256 wager, uint8 difficulty, uint8 status, uint256 gameId, uint256 createdAt, uint256 expiresAt)[])
function getPlayerStats(address player) external view returns (tuple(uint256 wins, uint256 totalWinnings, uint256 gamesPlayed))
function playerStats(address) external view returns (uint256 wins, uint256 totalWinnings, uint256 gamesPlayed)
event GameCreated(uint256 indexed gameId, address indexed host, uint256 wager, uint8 difficulty)
event GameJoined(uint256 indexed gameId, address indexed player)
event GameCancelled(uint256 indexed gameId, address indexed host)
event GameCompleted(uint256 indexed gameId, address indexed winner, uint256 winnings)
event WagerDeposited(uint256 indexed gameId, address indexed player, uint256 amount)
